channel.title: Business on SoCal Ranch - a (sub)urban ranching experiment in organic and digital life

item.title: Always Keep Your Word
item.description: If I tell someone that I will call them next week, I should call them. If I don’t, all I will be is the guy who can’t keep his word. Maybe that matters and maybe it doesn’t. If you run in to me down the road before you remember anything else about me, i’ll bet you remember me as the guy who didn’t call you back when I said I would.
